snippet.title: Bear Simulator [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Bear Simulator woo. Check it out on Greenlight and maybe vote for it if you're up for it:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=433856164

Also here's the game's website:
http://www.bearsimulator.com/

The video is little fuzzy for some reason even though I recorded footage at max bitrate so I don't what the deal is.

Twitter:
http://www.twitter.com/JohnFarjay

Blog:
http://www.farjay.com/
